subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[zongzi]] {{gloss|[[dumpling]] made of [[glutinous rice]], wrapped in leaves}} {{zh-mw|c:隻}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|粽子|粽仔|肉粽|粽葉|裹蒸粽|粽粑葉|角粽|鹼粽|粿粽|鹹肉粽|鹼水粽}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
Compound of {{ja-compound|茅|ち|巻|まき|pos1=short for ''chigaya'', "[[cogon]]"|t2=[[wrapping]]|sort=ちまき}}.

Originally, [[rice cake]]s were [[wrap]]ped in [[leaf|leaves]] from cogon [[grass]].<ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref><ref name="DJR"/>
